net.ttddyy.dsproxy.support
Class CommonsQueryCountLoggingFilter

java.lang.Object
  net.ttddyy.dsproxy.support.CommonsQueryCountLoggingFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.Filter
public class CommonsQueryCountLoggingFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.Filter

Servlet Filter to log the query metrics during a http request lifecycle using Apache Commons Logging. Some application server reuse threads without cleaning thread local values. Default, this filter clear the thread local value used to hold the query metrics. If you do not want to clear the thread local value, set "clearQueryCounter", a servlet parameter, to false. Also, you can set a log level.

Author:
Tadaya Tsuyukubo
See Also:
CommonsQueryCountLoggingHandlerInterceptor, CommonsQueryCountLoggingRequestListener
